name: Arcus (LWMedia)
description: Arcus is a fantasy action game where failure is just the next step in the story. Touch on the screen to aim and fire arrows at invading enemies. Swipe your finger to swing your sword at any angle. Spend resources between missions to buy special arrow types and increase your chances of success while you solve the mystery behind the new undead skeleton faction in a land where magic has been made taboo.
